con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:AddHierarchyRole>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>?</acr:MerchantId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr:Password>?</acr:Password>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr:UserId>?</acr:UserId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation>?</acr1:GeoLocationInformation>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr1:IMEI>?</acr1:IMEI>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr1:HierarchyRole>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:HierarchyRoleId>?</acr2:HierarchyRoleId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:InvoiceOption>?</acr2:InvoiceOption>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:Name>?</acr2:Name>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:ParameterList>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <acr2:HierarchyRoleParameter>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:Name>?</acr2:Name>\r <acr2:Option>?</acr2:Option>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:SendEmailAlert>?</acr2:SendEmailAlert>\r <acr2:TriggerAmount>?</acr2:TriggerAmount>\r </acr2:HierarchyRoleParameter>\r </acr2:ParameterList>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:PrivilegeList>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <acr2:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:Name>?</acr2:Name>\r </acr2:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r </acr2:PrivilegeList>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:ReceiptType>?</acr2:ReceiptType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:RoleId>?</acr2:RoleId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:RoleLevel>?</acr2:RoleLevel>\r </acr1:HierarchyRole>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:AddHierarchyRole>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
